page.title: 12Older Houses in Bristow Rd
page.content:
Bristow road was built in the late 1940's. It has a lot of older people living there because they have done so ever since their childhoods.
There are also a lot of young families moving in because it is the cheaper side of town and has good local schools and facilities. Many of the childen living in this area go to Watchetts Middle and{France Hill {Secondary}schools.
Recently, a lot of modernisation has been done in Bristow Road: the houses have been re-wired, had insulation put into the walls, been re-painted, and have had new sink units put in.
